member.name: D3D11_TEX3D_SRV
member.summary: Specifies the subresources from a 3D texture to use in a shader-resource view.

member.name: D3D11_TEX3D_SRV.MostDetailedMip
member.summary: Index of the most detailed mipmap level to use; this number is between 0 and MipLevels (from the original Texture3D for which creates a view) -1.

summary.para: The maximum number of mipmap levels for the view of the texture. See the remarks in .
Set to -1 to indicate all the mipmap levels from MostDetailedMip on down to least detailed.
